modName: Ultimate Thief Experience Save Game lvl 1
descriptionHtml:
Play with ultimately cute female Khajiit (level 1). Starts from Helgen Keep, no any quests made. I recommend to play on hardest difficulty and maybe add some mods which add some more difficulty if you think game is too easy (Skyrim ReLevel, Deadly Traps and Sickly Diseases, Custom Difficulty)

Recommended mods:
- Thief http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4555 very cool mod, must have :)
- Coverkhajiits http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5941
- No Perk Prerequisites http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1943
- Realistic Weapon Weights http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4663
- Leather Armor Alternative Textures http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5063
- Higher Jumping http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=164

Perks: 
- Agile defender rank 1
- Alchemist rank 1 
- Backstab 
- Light fingers rank 1 
- Merchant
- Muffled movement 
- Night thief
- Novice locks 
- Quick hands 
- Stealth 2
- Misdirection (Can pickpocket equipped weapons)
- Silent Roll
- Intimidation
- Bribery
- Unbreakable (v2)
- Wax Key (v2)
- Shadow Warrior (v2)
- Fence (v2)

Skills:
twohanded 5
onehanded 15 (v2 45)
marksman 15 (v2 30)
block 15 (v2 30)
heavyarmor 5
smithing 5
lightarmor 15 (v2 30)
alchemy 15
lockpicking 60
pickpocket 75 (v2 100)
sneak 75 (v2 100)
speechcraft 15
alteration 5
destruction 5
enchanting 15
illusion 15 (v2 30)
restoration 5
conjuration 5

Attributes:
Stamina 200
Health 100
Magicka 100

Items:
- Leather Armor
- Full Shrouded, Thieves Guild and Nightingale armor sets (v2)
author: littleatlas
